message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper focuses on sentiment classification of Twitter data, which is a common task in computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also addresses the question of how to properly evaluate sentiment classifiers, which involves statistical methods and machine learning techniques (cs.SI, cs.LG). The paper deals with ordered and unbalanced sentiment classes, which is a common problem in information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper deals with time-ordered data, which is a common problem in cyber-physical systems (cs.CY).
